summary: A FIRE STARTED UNDER THE HOOD OF MY CAR (DODGE STRATUS 1999) AFTER I PARKED IT AFTER DRIVING FOR ABOUT HALF AN HOUR.  THERE WAS NO PRIOR INDICATION OF ANYTHING AMISS.  FIRE DEPARTMENT PUT OUT THE FIRE, BUT I AM TOLD THE CAR CANNOT BE REPAIRED.  I HAVE HAD REGULAR MAINTENANCE ON THIS CAR.   *JB
